original_text: And all the people went to Gilgal; and there they made Saul king before the Lord in Gilgal; and there they sacrificed sacrifices of peace offerings before the Lord; and there Saul and all the men of Israel rejoiced greatly.
korean_text: 모든 백성이 길갈로 가서 거기서 여호와 앞에서 사울을 왕으로 삼고 길갈에서 여호와 앞에 화목제를 드리고 사울과 이스라엘 모든 사람이 거기서 크게 기뻐하니라

sentences.original_text: And all the people went to Gilgal
and there they made Saul king
of peace offerings before the Lord
and there Saul and all the men of Israel
